title: Imam prays on a soft mat and I doubt he can do Sujud properly, so is my prayer behind him valid?
transcript: made that mistake but it is Forgiven with the grace of Allah unas from Germany um if so there is a mid in which the carpet the front is really soft I know um when I know if it's too soft is invalid but I somehow can't judge so I talked to the Imam he said no it's okay but the man is really not scholar and he's not the greatest fan of of Saudi so I talked to him a little he refused to change it if I talk to him more and he still insists on praying that is my prayer behind him valid or yes it is valid
